changeSet.author: wangjun
changeSet.sql: create table user( `USER_ID` bigint(20) not null primary key auto_increment comment'主键', `USER_NAME` varchar(128) not null unique comment '用户名', `PASSWORD` varchar(128) not null comment '密码', `CREATE_AT` timestamp not null default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP comment '创建时间', `UPDATE_AT` timestamp not null default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP comment '更新时间' )ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_bin COMMENT = '用户表' ROW_FORMAT = Compact;
